subject: feat(ui): align mode switching with discovery doc specification
body:
Implements five missing features from the original discovery document
to make Designer and User modes visually and functionally distinct:

1. Persistent designer mode indicator — accent-colored banner strip
   below header always visible when in designer mode, plus header
   border tint. Ensures mode is obvious on mobile without opening
   the hamburger menu.

2. Schema selector dropdown — replaces static badge with interactive
   native <select> for switching schemas inline. Mobile-friendly via
   OS-native picker.

3. System node/arc rendering — useGraphData now accepts includeSystem
   flag. Designer mode loads system items rendered with 35% opacity
   and dashed borders. User mode filters them out entirely.

4. View Builder UI — new DesignerPanel with three tabs (Schemas,
   Views, Templates). ViewBuilder lists/creates ViewConfigurations;
   ViewConfigEditor provides full form for type, query, groupBy,
   sortBy, and applicable node types.

5. Template packaging — templateService exports schema + associated
   views as versioned JSON envelope. TemplateActions component
   provides export/import with validation and error handling.
